statements: SELECT * FROM customer_demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, gender, income FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY income ASC;
SELECT age, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40;
SELECT customer_id, gender, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE location LIKE '%York%';
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, income, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, age, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40 AND income < 70000 ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT customer_id, gender, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender='Female' AND location LIKE '%York%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(age) AS average_age, MAX(income) AS max_income FROM customer_demographics WHERE location='California';
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics;
SELECT age, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM customer_demographics;
SELECT customer_id, age, income FROM customer_demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT message_text, delivery_date FROM marketing_messages WHERE delivery_date >= '2021-08-01' ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT customer_id, age FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female' AND income > 50000;
SELECT message_text, delivery_date FROM marketing_messages WHERE target_group = 'VIP' ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, income FROM customer_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM marketing_messages WHERE delivery_date > '2022-01-01' AND delivery_date < '2022-03-01' ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_name, age, email_address FROM customers WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT c.customer_name, m.message_content, g.group_name FROM customers c JOIN marketing_messages m ON c.customer_id = m.group_id JOIN customer_groups g ON m.group_id = g.group_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_name, gender FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT customers.customer_name, customer_groups.group_name FROM customers JOIN customer_groups ON customers.customer_id = customer_groups.group_id
SELECT * FROM marketing_messages WHERE message_content LIKE '%special offer%'
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age > 30
SELECT customer_id, income FROM CustomerDemographics ORDER BY income DESC
SELECT segment_id, segment_name, description FROM CustomerSegments
SELECT delivery_id, message_id, customer_id, delivery_date FROM MessageDeliveries
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM CustomerDemographics ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT segment_name, description FROM CustomerSegments WHERE segment_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT message_content, delivery_date FROM MarketingMessages INNER JOIN MessageDeliveries ON MarketingMessages.message_id = MessageDeliveries.message_id

SELECT CustomerDemographics.customer_id, CustomerDemographics.gender, MessageDeliveries.delivery_date FROM CustomerDemographics INNER JOIN MessageDeliveries ON CustomerDemographics.customer_id = MessageDeliveries.customer_id
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM Customers;
SELECT * FROM CustomerGroups ORDER BY group_name;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, location FROM Customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, age, location FROM Customers;
SELECT * FROM CustomerGroups WHERE group_id = 1;
SELECT message_content, message_type FROM MarketingMessages WHERE group_id = 2;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, response_date FROM Customers JOIN CampaignResponses ON Customers.customer_id = CampaignResponses.customer_id WHERE CampaignResponses.campaign_id = 1;
